thread.title: CT Renaissance Faire

author: courant.com
title: CT Renaissance Faire
text:
Caption Connecticut Renaissance Faire Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Connecticut Renaissance Faire Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant See more galleries The Connecticut Renaissance Faire continues its celebration of the fall harvest at the North Haven Fairgrounds. The faire has made camp at the location for the last three weeks, inviting lords and ladies from around the area to partake in song, dance, and live theater, as well as, food, drink, and jousting tournaments. The party ends next weekend with an all Hallows Weekend, Oct. 24 and 25, when guests are encourged to wear their Halloween costumes.
Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant
